entry.title: LES SUÃŠTES WIND WARNING , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 06:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain early this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence this morning and early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:18 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:18 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
